title: 5 Year Survival Food Supply: $7,000 and 2.5 MILLION Calories
description:
#prepper #survival #foodstorage
This is an overview of my long term food storage. My complete prepper pantry including my color coded food system using 5-7 gallon buckets. this is 2.5 million calories which if rationed can last 1 person 5 years. This presumes 500,000 calories per year or roughly 1400 calories per day which is enough to sustain life. Realistically this is a 2.5 Year supply. That is 1 million calories per year per person.

title: INSIDE THE PREPPER MOVEMENT: Preparing for Disaster and Ensuring Survival | WELT Documentary
description:
Inside the Prepper Movement: Preparing for Disaster and Ensuring Survival

Preppers, or survivalists, are individuals who actively prepare for emergencies, including possible disruptions in social or political order, on scales ranging from local to international. Their preparations can include establishing self-sufficient food and water supplies, learning survival skills, and arranging for self-defense. The motives behind such activities often stem from fears of natural disasters, economic collapse, pandemics, or other catastrophic events. Prepping involves not just stockpiling resources but also planning for sustainability and independence, with a strong emphasis on adaptability and resilience. The movement has grown more visible and gained broader acceptance over recent years, particularly in light of real-world crises that underscore the fragility of modern infrastructures.

SURVIVAL TRAINING: Boot camps for the ultimate crisis - surviving in the woods without electricity

Coloradan Riley Cook is readying his family to live in a high-altitude bunker. Michael Patrick Douglas is training his children in primitive survival skills. Becky Brown is taking sharpshooting lessons with a sniper in order to prepare herself for a government takeover of Salt Lake City.

title: Bugging Out Isnâ€™t What You Think | The Reality of SHTF
description:
In this video "Bugging out isn't what you think the reality of SHTF" We break down the real difficulties of bugging out and why itâ€™s far more complicated than just grabbing a bug out bag and disappearing into the wilderness. 

Whether you're prepping for civil unrest, natural disasters, or a full-blown SHTF situation, understanding the right time and way to evacuate is just as crucial as knowing when to stay put

As a prepared citizen we never know when we will face uncertain times. Understanding when to bug out or when to bug in will ultimately determine if you survive. 
We delve deep into the fundamental aspects of bug out planning, covering mental resilience and navigation strategies, as well as selecting the appropriate bug out gear and avoiding common pitfalls. Youâ€™ll gain insights into preparing a reliable bug out location, crafting a foolproof bug out checklist, and comprehending the advantages of bugging out versus bugging in. Additionally, this comprehensive guide covers transportation preparation, survival strategies, and emergency preparedness techniques that can significantly enhance your chances of reaching safety or being caught in a disaster.
Preppers generally always have a good plan. This video prepares you for any dangerous encounter or hiding situation, whether traveling solo or with a group.

#SurvivalTips #BugOutBag #EmergencyPreparedness #SurvivalSkills #Prepping #SHTF #theoutdoorsman

title: Preppers in the USA - Emergency supplies, survival kits and bunkers | DW Documentary
description:
Ines Pohl went on a journey into the world of preppers. She visits a Fortitude Ranch secluded deep in a forest. It's a place designed to harbor several families for months at a time. She also visits a company that build shelters in people's yards. The people she visited have a common fear â€” and share the certainty that the state won't help them when push comes to shove.

Itâ€™s a journey into another aspect of Americaâ€™s soul.

title: Doomsday Preppers Is An Insane Show

title: 7 Canned Foods Every Prepper Should Stockpile in Their Survival Pantry
description:
Could you survive if your local grocery stores closed for a week? It's a daunting thought, isn't it? A month without easy access to food would be even worse, and many people might not know how to handle such a situation. 

Natural disasters have repeatedly exposed just how fragile our food security can be, reminding us that we should be prepared for the unexpected. When hurricanes and snowstorms disrupt vital supply chains, many families scramble to find simple necessities such as bread, milk, and other essentials. Smart preppers avoid this crisis by keeping survival foods ready and easily accessible in their homes. 

A well-stocked emergency pantry doesn't have to require expensive freeze-dried meals that might break the bank. In fact, canned survival food provides an affordable and practical solution that lasts for years without compromising on quality. 

These foods are accessible to more people at local stores, making them a smart choice for anyone looking to be prepared. If your emergency food supply needs strengthening or if youâ€™re just getting started, seven essential canned foods deserve a prominent space in your prepper pantry. 

Canned foods are perfect for preparedness because they give you a food option without the need to cook, which can be crucial during an emergency when resources may be limited. They also boast significant nutritional value, offering all the important vitamins and minerals your body needs to stay healthy. Additionally, canned foods have a long shelf life, meaning they can be stored for extended periods without going bad, which is ideal for anyone looking to stock up for the future. Plus, they're versatile, allowing you to create a variety of meals with minimal effort.

title: 5 Type Of Backyard Underground Bunker You Should Build | Doomsday Preppers
description:
Do you have an underground bunker in your backyard? If you havenâ€™t build one yet,  this video will help to you to choose 1 of the 5 best underground bunker to survive the coming doomsday.

For several decadesâ€™ prepping for a doomsday event has been a necessity for most people. This is very critical especially at these times when the future of humanity is uncertain in many ways. We have pandemics, social unrest and chaos all over and this means that we are living at very unpredictable times. For the older people, the events of the cold war are still fresh in their minds and the threat of a nuclear annihilation is still a big concern to them.  When you mention a doomsday bunker, most people always imagine of a concrete underground room that has been filled with canned goods, bottles of water and other survival gear. The threat of a global annihilation in our days feels more real than even during the cold war. However, todayâ€™s high security shelters are not much different from their 20th century counterparts.  

Globally, the demand for doomsday shelters has skyrocketed as people look for alternative means to protect themselves from any risks like asteroids, global pandemics, severe storms, tornadoes or even another world war. Most people are looking for a backyard underground bunker that not only offers high security but also luxury and comfort. We all need a doomsday shelter that can at least offer us the same comfort we get in our houses. Your grandfatherâ€™s underground bunker was not all that comfortable. It was metallic and looked like something from the military. People could not be comfortable in those bunkers for long in such a Spartan, bleak environment. We all need luxurious amenities like swimming pools, underground gardens with simulated natural light. With the current technology and advancements in construction, it is very simple to build a decent underground bunker in your backyard. 

Over the last 5 years, the demand for these shelters has increased dramatically and some of the companies that construct these bunkers have reported an astonishing 700 percent increase in demand. Most of the great world elites like hedge fund managers, sports stars, tech executives and business titans are rumored to at least own a doomsday bunker or some of them have modified their homes to add underground secret shelters. Most of the doomsday bunkers are made up of steal and at the same time they are reinforced with layers of concrete. They hold food that can support the residents for many months if not years. Most bunkers are constructed to be withstand earthquakes and at the same time they are capable of resisting nuclear blasts. 
These doomsday shelters come in different types based on the demand of particular individuals. People with a lot of cash can opt for custom bunkers that are designed from the ground up based on their specific requirements. Other people would prefer super large shelters, especially those who would prefer to ride difficult times in a doomsday community setting where they can have experiences that are almost similar to the real world. Most of these big community bunkers costs hundreds of millions. They are extremely big and they look similar to large military underground bunkers only that they have been redesigned with luxury amenities to serve normal people.  
Usually these bunkers are designed to support human life regardless of what happens in the real world. They can secure one from nuclear blasts and even biological weapons. The come equipped with sustainable power supply systems, blast valves, waste removal systems, water purification systems and other systems that ensures the safety and survival of residents even under the worst circumstances. We have many companies that build these doomsday bunkers. These shelters come in all forms of designs and shapes based on individuals preferences. These are some of the homemade doomsday bunkers we out there that anyone can construct very easily.

------------------
Most of artwork that are included with these videos have been created by The Economist and they are used as a representation of the subject matter. The representative artwork included with these videos shall not be construed as the actual events that are taking place.
Anything that is said on the video is either opinion, criticism, information or commentary.

title: Doomsday Preppers: Sensible or Insane?
description:
In this video, we're taking a look at the growing trend of Doomsday Preppers. Are they sensible people who are ready for any disaster, or are they insane people who are preparing for the end of the world? Let's take a look at Dan, the man who drinks his own "juice".

Are you interested in doomsday prepping and survivalism? Do you wonder if the tactics and strategies used by doomsday preppers on television are actually effective in the event of a disaster or crisis? In this video, we take an honest and critical look at the world of doomsday prepping. We evaluate the behavior and tactics of doomsday preppers, separating sense from nonsense and myth from reality. You'll get an inside look at what it takes to survive the end of the world, and you'll learn whether or not doomsday prepping is really worth it. With expert analysis and real-world examples, this video is a must-watch for anyone interested in doomsday survival. Keywords: doomsday prepping, survivalism, disaster preparedness, end of the world, preppers, survival tactics, crisis management.

Doomsday Preppers was an American reality television series that aired on the National Geographic Channel from 2011 to 2014. The program profiles various survivalists, or "preppers", who are preparing to survive the various circumstances that may cause the end of civilization, including economic collapse, societal collapse, and electromagnetic pulse. The quality of their preparations is graded by the consulting company Practical Preppers, who provide analysis and recommendations for improvements.

title: John Crist on doomsday preppers
Surviving The End: Exploring The World Of Modern Preppers | My America
description:
TRT Worldâ€™s â€˜My Americaâ€™ takes us across the country to uncover some of the political, social and cultural stories often ignored by the mainstream media.

In a world filled with uncertainty, more people are preparing for the worst. From natural disasters like Hurricane Debby to global crises like the COVID-19 pandemic, we explore the rise of prepping culture, meeting those who have turned their passion for preparedness into a way of life.

We'll dive into the motivations behind this movement, the businesses capitalising on it, and the psychological aspects that drive people to prepare for doomsday scenarios. Is prepping a rational response to turbulent times, or is it driven by a culture of fear?

title: Hereâ€™s Why â€œDoomsday Preppersâ€ Was Canceled After Season 4
description:
Many believed that the end of the world would happen in some distant future, long after they were gone. However, others were convinced that this was imminent, either through natural or man-made causes, and so spent most of their time preparing for it. â€œDoomsday Preppersâ€ featured these people, as they shared how they planned to ride out the catastrophic event. As it became the highest-rated series in the history of the National Geographic Channel, avid fans found it odd that it was canceled after four seasons.

We'll try to answer to questions below in this video:
What is Doomsday Preppers?
Who is Doomsday Preppers cast?
What happened to Doomsday Preppers?
Who is Doomsday Preppers judges?
Is Doomsday Preppers canceled? 
Where was Doomsday Preppers filmed?
Who is Doomsday Preppers host?

#DoomsdayPreppers #MichaelIzquierdo #StephenMangan

title: Doomsday Preppers-   Garden of Eden or Garden of Evil?
description:
See Rick Austin (the Survivalist Gardener) and Survivor Jane on the National Geographic Channels' Doomsday Preppers episode featuring their homestead and their Secret Garden of Survival.

Learn homesteading and preparedness skills, and see features on their property that can protect you and help you become  more prepared and self sufficient.

Find out what grows in the Secret Garden of Survival, how it works, and  how you can grow one for yourself!

If you want to learn more about growing more food than you can eat, without chemicals, here are links to Rickâ€™s books:

title: Doomsday Preppers React to Fallout 4
description:
With the release of the new Fallout TV series on Amazon Prime, it's the perfect time to dive into the captivating world of Fallout 4. In this episode, we welcome back Nat and Joe, two seasoned survivalists who will be reacting to the popular post-apocalyptic video game. Known for their dedication to preparing for worst-case scenarios, Nat and Joe bring a unique perspective to the table as they explore the game's dystopian setting. Fallout 4 provides an interesting insight into a potential future they have been diligently preparing for, and their expertise in survival tactics will shed light on the game's portrayal of a world ravaged by nuclear war.

Subscribe for More Gamology: https://tinyurl.com/gamologysubscribe

Throughout the episode, Nat and Joe will offer their thoughts on the survival tactics employed by the characters in Fallout 4, analyzing the effectiveness and realism of each approach. They will provide commentary on the different strategies that could be employed in a real-world post-apocalyptic scenario, drawing from their extensive knowledge and experience in the field. From scavenging for resources to building secure shelters, Nat and Joe will share their own insights and tips for how to survive in a world where society has collapsed, much like the one depicted in Fallout 4. They will also discuss the importance of mental resilience, adaptability, and the value of forming alliances in a time of crisis, all of which are crucial themes explored in the Fallout series. 

--------------------
Check out some of our past videos!

Preppers REACT to The Last of Us
https://youtu.be/Bf-YkppAyOg

Preppers REACT to Post-Apocalyptic Games
https://youtu.be/OFF74W6Ou2k

Preppers REACT to Survival Games
https://youtu.be/-hP8UOTEmHE

Experts React Playlist:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLGzvIvmnk2hSimNROcgMPJtZXynE8HoDI
--------------------
Thanks to TwinbornBug4 for the gameplay:
https://www.youtube.com/@twinbornbug4468
--------------------
Fallout 4 is a 2015 action role-playing game developed by Bethesda Game Studios and published by Bethesda Softworks. It is the fourth main game in the Fallout series and was released worldwide on November 10, 2015, for PlayStation 4, Windows, and Xbox One.
The main story takes place in the year 2287, ten years after the events of Fallout 3 and 210 years after "The Great War", which caused catastrophic nuclear devastation across the United States. The player assumes control of a character referred to as the "Sole Survivor", who emerges from a long-term cryogenic stasis in Vault 111, an underground nuclear fallout shelter. After witnessing the murder of their spouse and the kidnapping of their son, the Sole Survivor ventures out into the Commonwealth to search for their missing child. The player explores the game's dilapidated world, completes various quests, helps out factions, and acquires experience points to level up and increase the abilities of their character. New features to the series include the ability to develop and manage settlements and an extensive crafting system where materials scavenged from the environment can be used to craft drugs and explosives, upgrade weapons and armor, and construct, furnish, and improve settlements. Fallout 4 also marks the first game in the series to feature full voice acting for the protagonist.

title: How Doomsday Preppers Lie to You
description:
Every video I'll try to cover things I didn't quite have time to discuss in the video or felt didn't fit. 

I should have clarified that most preppers sell a product on their own website, which inherently seems scummy since they are pushing fear. They aren't just being transparent about supporting them; they're saying it will "save you" or "help you."

It would be much different if they were just selling their own merch or being transparent about their earnings from it. I would guess maybe possibly some of this would almost be against the law regarding sponsorship disclosure since they have a vested interest in scaring you into buying or pretend its just part of their normal list of "essentials".

Most of this is jokes or satire, so don't take it too seriously. I don't think any of these creators are evil or bad, except that one dude trying to bring in Christian nationalism.

title: 8 Facts About Doomsday Preppers
description:
From stockpiling supplies and purchasing gears to doomsday architects preparing shelters. Here are facts about doomsday preppers. 

What happened today in serial killer history? Visit https://theywillkillyou.com/ for macabre murders and gruesome details you wonâ€™t find anywhere else!

Subscribe for new videos: http://goo.gl/SaufF4
Follow us on Instagram: @theywillkillyou
Voiceover by Carl Mason: carlito1705@icloud.com

Number 8 Survivalism
Survivalists actively prepare for situations that involve abrupt changes to the environment. Those that specifically prepare for world-ending events are commonly referred to as doomsday preppers. The inherent motivation is being able to overcome the difficulties brought about by such major disruptions. Becoming fully self-reliant is a major component of a prepperâ€™s motivation. 
Number 7 Historical Roots
From an evolutionary and historical standpoint, people have always been preparing for the worst. An argument can be made that itâ€™s the same drive thatâ€™s led to the foundation of civilization. Yet, the rapid development of the modern world has apparently eliminated the need for survival skills. Itâ€™s the type of situation that preppers have historically aimed to avoid. 
Number 6 Scenarios
There are several types of doomsday preppers in accordance to the scenario they believe to be most likely. Itâ€™s worth mentioning that a prepper would rarely belong to a single category and elements often intertwine. That being said, some are concerned that oil will run out, so they learn how to become self-sufficient through agriculture. Others believe that hyperinflation will make money worthless so they tend to stockpile gold and silver bullion. Those concerned with weather cycles that cause crop failures, might prepare to last for up to a decade. This includes storing several tons of food and owning a heavy-duty greenhouse with canned, non-hybrid seeds. They might block sunlight or make the environment uninhabitable in other ways. There are also survivalists who favor a reliance on the wilderness, with a focus on basic needs that follows the rule of 3.  
Number 5
Thatâ€™s not saying that there arenâ€™t preppers among them with an authentic concern for safety.  
Number 4 Common Stockpile
While there are different types of doomsday preppers, thereâ€™s some commonality when it comes to certain items they stockpile. These are in addition to the creation of a retreat or haven, which can be anything from an underground bunker to a cabin in the woods. Water and water-purification equipment as well as non-perishable food are among the first priorities. Theyâ€™re followed by medical supplies, adequate clothing and lighting sources. A must for doomsday preppers is whatâ€™s called a â€œbug out bagâ€ or BOB. Itâ€™s a bag containing useful items and basic necessities that enables them to leave a location quickly. Most survivalists tend to employ a â€œBe Preparedâ€ mentality in their everyday lives. This is also the international Scout Motto and it refers to a â€œstate of readiness in mind and bodyâ€. 
Number 3 Codes and Acronyms
In addition to the BOB, or bug-out bag, there are also the BOL and BOV, as in bug-out location and bug-out vehicle. This is in reference to the titular character of a 1913 childrenâ€™s book, who finds a reason to be optimistic about anything. 
Number 2 Skills of a Doomsday Prepper
Most preppers would argue that â€œskills weigh nothingâ€ which means that, in addition to useful items, one most possess knowledge and skills. Preppers can rely on them to turn any situation to their advantage. Navigating by using a compass, reading a map or looking at the stars can be very useful. These skills can be complimented by practicing agriculture as well. Another aspect that some preppers emphasize is maintaining a good level of health and fitness. Mental training toward keeping oneâ€™s composure is also important as a prepper might end up alone for days on end. 
Number 1 Doomsday Preppers in the US
A 2017 survey revealed that an estimated 68 million adults had purchased survival gear. Out of them, adult males tended to be more involved, but only by a slight margin of 1.8 percent. From a generational standpoint, millennials were at the forefront, at 42%, followed by Gen Xers at 31% and Baby Boomers at 17%. As of 2019, a growing number of people all over the globe fear a world-changing event is coming, which consequently has also led to a rise in doomsday prepping.

title: Doomsday Preppers: Mental Health and Personality
description:
This video answers the questions: What are Preppers (Doomsday Preppers, Disaster Preppers)? Concerns about the end of the world have been featured in the media for many years (e.g. The Walking Dead, I am legend, World War Z, Armageddon, Deep Impact, The Day After Tomorrow, Oblivion, Zombieland, The Postman, and Mad Max). Many themes have emerged including survival, resisting evil, adaptation, and rebuilding society. Some of those concerned with these themes have started preparing for a collapse of society. I examine possible personality and mental health characteristics associated with these behaviors.

References:

Norah Campbell, Gary Sinclair & Sarah Browne (2019) Preparing for a world
without markets: legitimising strategies of preppers, Journal of Marketing Management, 35:9-10,
798-817, DOI: 10.1080/0267257X.2019.1631875

Disaster Prepper: Health, Identity, and American Survivalist Culture
Kabel, Allison;Chmidling, Catherine
Human Organization; Fall 2014; 73, 3; ProQuest, pg. 258

Kyrios, M., Mogan, C., Moulding, R., Frost, R. O., Yap, K., & Fassnacht, D. B. (2018). The cognitiveâ€“behavioural model of hoarding disorder: Evidence from clinical and nonâ€clinical cohorts. Clinical Psychology & Psychotherapy, 25(2), 311â€“321. https://doi-org.mylibrary.wilmu.edu/10.1002/cpp.2164

Moulding, R., Nedeljkovic, M., Kyrios, M., Osborne, D., & Mogan, C. (2017). Shortâ€term cognitiveâ€“behavioural group treatment for hoarding disorder: A naturalistic treatment outcome study. Clinical Psychology & Psychotherapy, 24(1), 235â€“244. https://doi-org.mylibrary.wilmu.edu/10.1002/cpp.2001

Raines, A. M., Oglesby, M. E., Allan, N. P., Short, N. A., & Schmidt, N. B. (2016). Understanding DSM-5 Hoarding Disorder: A Triple Vulnerability Model. Psychiatry, 79(2), 120â€“129.

title: Doomsday Preppers React to Survival Games
description:
For the first time on the channel, we have 2 brand new guests in preppers and veteran survivalists experts, Nat Sellers and Joe Alton. They are ready and prepped (pun intended) today to analyze and critique some survival games from the likes of Stranded Deep, Green Hell, No Man's Sky and The Long Dark. Make sure to always bring a lighter wherever you go, folks! It's the golden standard.
--------------------
Check out some of our past videos!

Survival Expert REACTS to Green Hell PART 1 | Experts React
https://youtu.be/BxuHaYdr6t0

Experts React Playlist:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLGzvIvmnk2hSimNROcgMPJtZXynE8HoDI
--------------------
Stranded Deep is a survival video game developed by Australian studio Beam Team Games for Microsoft Windows, macOS, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, Xbox One and Linux.
ï»¿
ï»¿Green Hell is a survival video game developed and published by Creepy Jar. The game takes place in the Amazon rainforest.
ï»¿
ï»¿The Long Dark is a first-person survival video game developed and published by Hinterland Studios. The player assumes the role of a crash-landed bush pilot Will Mackenzie who must survive the frigid Canadian wilderness after a geomagnetic storm.
ï»¿
ï»¿No Man's Sky is an action-adventure survival game developed and published by Hello Games. It was released worldwide for the PlayStation 4 and Microsoft Windows in August 2016, for Xbox One in July 2018, and for the PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X and Series S consoles in November 2020.

title: DOOMSDAY PREPPERS  UK  Is it so silly ?
description:
Is prepping for the worst such a silly thing to do with what's going on in the world, I don't think it is. This is just really a pointless clip, but on a serious note if the shops closed tomorrow due to war or Cyber attack (more likely ) How prepared are you. Simple things like headache tablets, pain killers , vitamins and so on, especially if you suffer with migraines , back pain or any illness come to think of it do you have enough of what you need to cover you a few weeks or months. And how much food do you have if the streets were rioting and there was civil unrest. I am no doomsday prepper trust me, but there are a lot more people than you think covering there backs just in case it all kicks off. Having 3 , 6 or 12 months of supplies may not be such a silly idea. Just putting it out there even if this make a few people think about it, its worth it if it all kicks off. The clip is only some of the stuff I have in place just in case it kicks off ,This is not advice . Anyone else doing this sort of thing  please give info of what you are doing, love to get tips.
Things like rice good for 30 years , Honey good forever if stored right. (I have 50 jars ), powdered milk,   rolled oats , pasta and so on. there is so much stuff you can store for years its unreal. This is not advice for people  its just what I am doing like a lot of others are. I am no doomsday prepper trust me I have no interest in conspiracy theories , or its the Government bruv in it . Just a normal every day lad  that's covering his and his families backs. Remember if you have kids they look to you for help....?. 
And please if you think anything is in accurate and its all a load of crap that's fine just move on and don't let it bother you, life is to short to worry about stuff that really doesn't matter or affects you in any way. Here is a link about storing tinned food and there are others links on the ebayers site https://youtu.be/zRclbapsmzU?si=TI8psxLY8bh605Wh.

title: British doomsday preppers prepare for the apocalypse in Cornwall
description:
Doomsday prepping is the act of preparing for catastrophic events that could disrupt or end society as we know it. Whether itâ€™s natural disasters, economic collapse, pandemics, nuclear war, government breakdown, or even a rare solar storm known as a Carrington Event, preppers aim to be ready for anything.

To find out more about the UK prepping community, Laura traveled to Penzance in Cornwall to camp with a group of British preppers during a weekend meet-upâ€”just one in a series of gatherings happening across the country this summer. These events offer a rare chance for preppers to connect in person, share ideas, compare kit, and pick up new survival skills. From crossbows to combat boots, attendees were keen to discuss what gear is essential for life after disaster.

Over the course of the weekend, participants attended a variety of practical workshops and demonstrations. One session taught attendees how to filter fluoride out of tap water, while another explained how to select the best gas mask to survive a chemical or biological attack. There was even a hands-on tutorial on how to forage for food in the wild.

The reasons for prepping are as diverse as the attendees themselves. From concerns about Brexit to falling down online conspiracy rabbit holes, each prepper has their own story of how they began stockpiling tins. The weekend also revealed what crises they believe are most likely to hit the UKâ€”and how they view National Geographicâ€™s portrayal of preppers in its Doomsday Preppers series. As well as, what they think of their gun-toting American counterparts.

Watch the full story to understand the mindset of British doomsday preppersâ€”and what they're preparing for.

Reporter: Laura Beveridge
Videographer: Ben Lewis
Video Editor: Laura Beveridge and Oli Johnson

Like PoliticsJOE? We need your support: 
https://www.patreon.com/PoliticsJOE

title: Bubi Bottle Review by Tim Ralston of NatGeo 's Doomsday Preppers
description:
Tim Ralston of National Geographic 's Doomsday Preppers fame demos the bubi bottle! Bubi bottles are collapsible, heatable, freezable, scrunchable bottles that can be used in a number of ways. 

VISIT GEARUPCENTER.COM FOR THE BEST IN SELF-RELIANCE AND PERSONAL PREPAREDNESS GEAR! 

PRODUCT INFO

The 22 oz. Bubi Bottle is the ultimate sport water bottle for long hikes, day trips or any thirsty adventurers. Re-use it. Freeze it. Boil it. Best of all, when you're not using your Bubi Bottle, you can scrunch it!

That's right, the Bubi Bottle is the world's first scrunchable water bottle. Once you drink your water you can actually roll it up and use the specially designed carabiner tab to secure it in that position. With your 22 oz. bottle folded down to a fraction of its original size, you're free to focus on the adventure at hand.

The Bubi Bottle is the perfect sport water bottle for anyone with an active lifestyle, from the Iron Man to the Weekend Warrior.

â€¢ The 1.75 inch opening provides easy filling and dispensing. The mouth has a retainer which meters the water flow and can be removed to add ice.
â€¢ Made of high grade silicone. BPA-free and FDA-approved for food contact.
â€¢ Eco-friendly, RoHS approved in Europe, FDA-approved in USA, materials.
â€¢ Totally spherical (with no creases), the bottle can be cleaned easily with a brush or place in the dishwasher.

Originally designed as a water bottle, it does so much more!!

â€¢ Microwave* & Freezer safe (can be used as cold & hot compress)

â€¢ Mold resistant

title: DOOMSDAY PREPPERS UK  Is it so silly ? part 2  Bottle gas in house  cooker hob ?
description:
This is just a clip about how and why I switched the house cooker hob to a gas bottle as people have asked how its done. I have found this has saved us loads of money and as gas prices go up and down  I am covered and can ride the the high prices and when they drop you can re fill up. Again I must say this is not Doomsday prepping really its just being sensible if the worst ever happened.
FORGOT TO SAY IN CLIP  if you do this and buy a gas hob you have to get  gas bottle hob jets. Its still a normal hob but it comes with different jets for the gas rings. so when looking to buy a hob put in gas bottle hob. It just means the hob with come with both sets of jets. Or if you have a gas hob and want to switch to bottle gas just get new jets for your rings.

title: Doomsday prepper shares survival tips for WWIII â€” including 90-day food stockpile
description:
A Doomsday prepper has shared survival tips for World War III â€” including having a 90-day food supply and investing in communication gear.

Derrick James, 50, who hails from rural Maine, started building his food stockpile and making emergency plans for natural disasters and war in 2007.

The content creator claims current tensions between the US and Iran will inspire others to start prepping.

â€œEvery event that we have lived through â€” whether it is Covid, the Iraq war or hurricanes â€” brings in a new wave of preppers,â€ he told Southwest News Service. â€œMy advice is to take a deep breath, come up with a plan that you can stick to, and donâ€™t stress yourself out.â€

Read more at https://nypost.com/2025/06/27/lifestyle/doomsday-prepper-shares-survival-tips-for-wwiii-including-90-day-food-stockpile-things-could-unravel-very-quickly/

title: Paranormal Sounds Caught On Camera At This Abandoned Doomsday Preppers Mansion
description:
For All The People Saying It's Not A Doomsday House Watch This (Also Contains More Info) https://youtu.be/PELfFjp_FxU?si=t8_4qcZrkGYTyxiJ

This house is one of my favorite designs ever! This is definitely one of the main ways I would design my house! I think about living in this place and being in here late at night standing in the doorway of the office facing the living room with no overhead light, just lamps and a sconce on that wall behind the piano in the living room & the rest of the lights off & being able to have the windows fully open in the dark, the privacy of it and everything is just amazing. My favorite design is the Flintstone Mansion! I'll link that here! https://youtu.be/CcTl42ygK_g Look in that description for details on why.

See a birdseye view of this place from an unknown date! https://www.instagram.com/p/DNeKbc2Ojzf/?img_index=1&igsh=MWZxOTM0bWlwZzJqaQ==

Collab & Thumbnail Credit @The.ForgottenPlaces

Some more things my friend filmed here including family photos from inside the home!

title: Doomsday Preppers need Magnetic Pulser for Pain Management--National Geographic--YouTube Video
description:
If you are a believer in the near 2012 doomsday you are one of the million Doomsday Preppers as shown in the National Geographic Channel. Make no mistake, the doomsday scenario will hit us hard, the question is when. If you are an older person you will observe the accelerating decay of our world. Climate change alone causes disastrous consequences, not to mention the possibilities of an economic collapse, global pandemic, nuclear war, solar-flare-inducted power failures, mega quake, and extreme oil crises. 
You can prepare for many occurrences, for shelter, food, weapons, but what about your health?
If you are in pain and can hardly move, all your doomsday preparations, including your First Aid Kit is useless.
However, if you want to belong to the progressive Doomsday Preppers, you have to own the BIO MEDICI for you and your family, for pain management for various health applications.
The Germans are known in the world for their leading achievements. Just to mention a few names that improved our daily lives, for instance, Johannes Gutenberg invented the first printing press in 1439, Albert Einstein discovered the theory of relativity, Von Braun, was responsible for the NASA Apollo Moon mission, the Horton brothers developed in 1933 the first Stealth-Wing Bomber, Otto Hahn for nuclear chemistry, Conrad Roentgen for x-rays, Robert Koch for isolation of tuberculosis, cholera and anthrax, Karl Benz for the first car. 
Out of this environment the physicist Dr. Wolfgang Ludwig from Germany, developed in 1974, with his mother in mind, the first hands free magnetic pulser, but without the impractical magnetic pads or paddle, or adapter, as still used in North America and Australia.
His mother was suffering very often from severe weather related health problems.
The little magnetic pulser emitted the Schumann base frequency. The unbelievable occurred; as soon as his mother applied the magnetic pulser to her solar plexus or in the nape of the neck, the symptoms disappeared instantly. His medical knowledge helped him, to create the perfect therapy device.
Dr. Ludwig is known as the absolute authority or as "the father" of Pulsed Magnetic Therapy in Germany. Many scientific documentations and symposia in Europe and North America are witness of his full commitment to pulsed magnetic therapy. In addition, Dr. Ludwig worked also with NASA to incorporate the first magnetic pulser on a manned spacecraft.

Since 1984, the BIO MEDICI is manufactured in Canada with German know how. For Doomsday Preppers the device is the ideal pain management device, it works with a 9-Volt battery, lasting for a couple of years. Unlike other devices, there is no need to hold a paddle during the treatment time. One doesn't need to plug in a 120 Volt adapter, responsible for uncontrolled magnetic fields, reaching over 3 feet, offsetting the treatment. In the last years, the FDA approved magnetic field therapy for bone healing and recently for depression, pain and edema. See how a German hospital handles their pain management with 20 magnetic pulser and see the double blind test reports from 3000 patients at http://www.magnetictherapycure.com  and read also the interesting testimonials of. 
For additional information go to the websites: http://www.magneticpulser.us , or http://www.backpaintreatment.ca

title: Waterbob Overview by Tim Ralston of National Geographic 's Doomsday Preppers
description:
Tim Ralston, spokesman for NatGeos Doomsday Preppers series, reveals the waterBOB.  

Check out the waterBOB at the Gear Up store online: http://www.gearupcenter.com/products/water-bob.html


The waterBOBÂ® is a water containment system that holds up to 100 gallons of fresh drinking water in any standard bathtub in the event of an emergency. Constructed of heavy duty food grade plastic, the waterBOBÂ® keeps water fresh and clean for drinking, cooking, washing and flushing. Water stored in an open bathtub, with dirt, soap film and exposure to debris will spoil and become useless.

During a hurricane or tropical storm, water main breaks and storm surges can interrupt or even contaminate your water supply. It is during these conditions the waterBOBÂ® may be used for temporary water storage. Constructed of heavy duty plastic that is FDA compliant for food storage, the waterBOBÂ® keeps water fresh and clean for up to 4 weeks. 

The waterBOBÂ® is very easy to use. Simply lay the liner in any standard bathtub, attach the fill sock to the faucet and fill the bladder to capacity, which takes approximately 20 minutes. A siphon pump is included to easily dispense the water into jugs or pitchers. Never wait in line again to buy expensive bottled water! Be prepared with the waterBOBÂ®.

title: Survivalists & Doomsday Preppers - Getting Ready for the End | Subculture Shock
description:
Survivalists, also known as Doomsday Preppers (with some differences), are a subculture that exists primarily within the United States along with some showing up in Canada and various European nations. The main principle behind the movement is, well, to survive. What exactly? Well since their coming of fruition in the sixties and refining what all the culture is supposed to be around the eighties and noughties, they seek to survive any form or societal collapse regardless of scale; so anything from a natural disaster to World War Three. So why exactly did they come about? How come we have different names for them? And will there be mention of [insert survivalist militia I write fanfics about here] in this video? Answers to those questions (mostly the first two) and more in this episode of Subculture Shock. 

There will probably be a comment or two about this video format, we're just trying something a bit more experimental and cinematic for this one. We'll be reworking and refining the process based on how well this is received. Additionally, apologies for the lack of variety with images/video used - a lot of what we were looking for historically is unavailable with what resources we have at our disposal. And don't mind the greenscreen blunder, that was an issue we didn't realize until editing began. 

I should also mention since I used more than one of his songs, a good portion of this video used music by Ayden George; if you don't know him form the HOI4 modding community, the guy makes a lot of synthwave music.

Per creative commons attribution (and generally good practice for artists), you can find his channel here: https://www.youtube.com/@ayden_george_official 


Disclaimer (because one isn't enough): We are not a group of professional researchers, at best we're people interested in the world around them and perpetual college students. We encourage all out viewers to use these videos as a stepping-stone to introduce themselves to whatever subculture the video above covers.   

Sources: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1s-AP_LZy2QG-g4QK10W115C9GKcZNa31ADoeZkapN9k/edit?usp=sharing
tags: subculture shock,survivalists,survivalist militias,doomsday preppers,prepper culture,the end of the world,surviving the end of the world,surviving the collapse of civilization,orthodoxfreiheit,preppers,preppers in popular culture,history of doomsday preppers

title: Staten Island University Hospital / Northwell Health Presents Doomsday Preppers
description: Staten Island University Hospital / Northwell Health, located at 475 Seaview Avenue in Staten Island, NY 10305, (718) 226-9000 and http://siuh.edu, presents Doomsday Preppers. Effective response to disaster events like Superstorm Sandy, the evacuation from Hurricane Irene, and the Ferry Crash of 2003 doesn't happen at the push of a button - it takes work. SIUH routinely drills disaster scenarios: preparing for the worst, so we can be at our best. The hospital conducted a mass casualty scenario in November, similar to Boston Marathon Bombing in April of 2013, that tested the hospital's ability to receive, triage, and care for a high-volume surge of patients.

description:
How to survive like the US Army. Doomsday prepping has become a big part of major societies. There's a belief that either societies will collapse or crazy weather will devastate certain areas.

http://youtu.be/TelSpC-PPno

Welcome to my brand new channel! This is my first app review. I will review more useful apps very soon so stay tuned! 

The US Army Survival Guide app shows you how to survive in any situation. Need to find water in the desert? Have a sprained ankle? Need to know if the plant in front of you is edible? Look no further. 

This is also a nice app to have if you're going camping or will be outdoors for an extended length of time.

title: Doomsday Preppers Review  Preparing For a Pole Shift
description:
If you are new to prepping and have never watched the show Doomsday Preppers, I recommend you do. I will say however, do it with an open mind. While this show is a great way to learn about different aspects of preparedness, the producers intentionally made some of the preppers look bad.

If youâ€™ve been prepping for a little while you have no doubt seen the show, and like us, itâ€™s been a while. Thatâ€™s why we decided to go back and watch Doomsday Preppers again and review it to give you our thoughts on each of the preppers on the show.

This video is possibly one of the best guests they have had on the show. Paul & Gloria have been able to take preparedness to the level most of us wish we could.

All videos are also on Rumble: https://rumble.com/c/SurvivalistPrepper

This house is one of my favorite designs ever! This is definitely one of the main ways I would design my house! I think about living in this place and being in here late at night standing in the doorway of the office facing the living room with no overhead light, just lamps and a sconce on that wall behind the piano in the living room & the rest of the lights off & being able to have the windows fully open in the dark, the privacy of it and everything is just amazing. title: US nuclear targets, what would happen to Massachusetts? #doomsday #preppers #doomsdaylastsurvivors
description:
Massachusetts sits in a tricky spot. With 6 military bases and Bostonâ€™s major economic weight, itâ€™s not at the top of the target list but its coastal location and closeness to places like DC and NY bump it into medium-to-high risk territory. This is just a scenario, not reality. Want to hear about another state? Drop it below

Okay so first Massachusetts has 6 military bases mainly focused on the air force. Boston is the most populous city with 650 thousand people, as well as one of the largest and most economically important cities in the U.S. Additionally, Massachusetts is home to critical infrastructure, including power grids and transportation systems. Even though this state would not be a main target to attack, its proximity to key targets like Washington D.C, NY and its location in the coast places Massachusetts as a medium to high risk target.
Stay tuned for more insights, and remember this is not happening, this is just a scenario.

Even short-distance camping excursions can quickly turn into life-threatening situations if you become lost, injured or affected by unexpected weather.  So, when preparing for an emergency camping survival situation, having the right defense tools and gadgets can not only save your life but the lives of many others.. These gadgets cover the basics:  shelter, water, fire, food, and safety . Tailor your kit to the environmentâ€”colder climates might need a heavier blanket, while wet areas demand more waterproofing. title: Doomsday Preppers Food Supply List For Doomsday Survival
description:
Doomsday Preppers Food Supply List For Doomsday Survival

Long-term emergency food storage is no longer just the practice of paranoid doomsday propagandists; everyone should do it.

In floods and hurricanes, you need food and clean water.

If you plan to consume food only in the right packaging, you need to think again. From time to time you buy things from Amazon to build up your grocery inventory.

To prepare for the worst and keep your food in top condition, you need the right storage to store food properly.

Keeping bacteria at bay should be the first step to ensuring food stays on the shelf for a long time. Food storage bags in Mylar are a great solution to create an environment that influences the quality of food.

They are designed to store food for much longer, and they ensure that your food is stored in a safe environment, such as the refrigerator, freezer or even in your basement.

So these are some of the most important survival foods we recommend. Note: we do not have a list of them all. However, items such as chicken, beef, pork, fish, poultry and eggs make the list.

There is not a ton of non-perishable spices, but there are a few, if you hope to put them on the list of survival foods.

While the DIY approach is always recommended for food storage, there are some circumstances in which a commercially produced food supply might make sense.

Where this is not the case, because you have to have things that you would normally cook and eat in your normal life. You may also want foods that require very little cooking and can be eaten without any preservation.

The recommended foods are typically things that you already have in your pantry and that you should eat regularly, such as fruits, vegetables, nuts, and seeds.

Best of all, you don't need an end-of-the-world scenario to use your food supplies. You just have to know how to store them and have the best food in stock.

If you only buy the food and supplies previously mentioned, you may be better off than most of the population, but you are not that prepared.

However, now you have a list of important foods that will let you survive for a while if they are properly packaged.

References:

title: How to Start a Prepper Food Pantry | Doomsday Preppers Advice
description:
0:00:00 - 0:00:04
A prepper food pantry is where food is kept
for emergency purposes.

0:00:04 - 0:00:09
These emergency situations could be floods,
hurricanes, tornadoes, earthquakes, tsunamis,

0:00:09 - 0:00:12
storms, pandemics, and so on.

0:00:12 - 0:00:16
Therefore, knowing how to start a food pantry
as a prepper will make sure you and your family

0:00:16 - 0:00:22
have enough food to last through any emergency
situation until things return to normalcy.

0:00:22 - 0:00:26
The following are suggestions from doomsday
preppers from around the world, suggesting

0:00:26 - 0:00:29
the best ways to build up your food pantry
as a prepper.

0:00:29 - 0:00:33
Without further ado, these are things you
need to put in mind as a prepper when starting

0:00:33 - 0:00:35
your food pantry.

0:00:35 - 0:00:38
First of all, store foods you're familiar
with.

0:00:38 - 0:00:42
In the face of disaster, the best consolation
you could give yourself is to eat what you

0:00:42 - 0:00:44
are already familiar with.

0:00:44 - 0:00:46
You donâ€™t want to eat just anything.

0:00:46 - 0:00:50
You also donâ€™t want to eat foods thatâ€™ll
upset your body system, making you throw up

0:00:50 - 0:00:52
all over the place.

0:00:52 - 0:00:56
Therefore, you want to stock food items that
you love.

0:00:56 - 0:00:59
There are a lot of prepper food ideas from
top preppers themselves which youâ€™ll most

0:00:59 - 0:01:01
definitely love.

0:01:01 - 0:01:04
Secondly, choose non-perishable food items.

0:01:04 - 0:01:10
Eggs, flour, rice, beans, pasta, dehydrated
fruits, etc, are non-perishable foods that

0:01:10 - 0:01:12
have a long shelf life.

0:01:12 - 0:01:16
These foods should be a part of your survival
pantry food list.

0:01:16 - 0:01:20
Moreover, you can buy some of these in bulk
to save money since their prices could potentially

0:01:20 - 0:01:22
spike during emergencies.

0:01:22 - 0:01:26
Thatâ€™s if you have the opportunity to get
them at all.

0:01:26 - 0:01:29
Thirdly, choose nutritional foods.

0:01:29 - 0:01:33
You don't want to fill your store with junk
and other unhealthy foods.

0:01:33 - 0:01:37
You need something that will give you energy,
strength, and keep you healthy.

0:01:37 - 0:01:42
Therefore, opt for foods that are rich in
protein, vitamins, minerals, and so on.

0:01:42 - 0:01:48
Some of the best prepper food ideas are beans,
nuts, rice, corn, eggs, amongst others.

0:01:48 - 0:01:52
You don't have to buy them all at once; it
should be a gradual process to ensure you

0:01:52 - 0:01:54
do not buy things you don't need.

0:01:54 - 0:01:58
And a good prepper practice is always to use
previously purchased food items first and

0:01:58 - 0:02:00
replace them with new ones.

0:02:00 - 0:02:04
Now that you are familiar with how to start
a prepper food pantry and what to start with,

0:02:04 - 0:02:08
letâ€™s talk about how to preserve your food
items in your pantry.

0:02:08 - 0:02:13
Most certainly, you don't want your food items
to turn bad in days or weeks after you've

0:02:13 - 0:02:14
purchased them.

0:02:14 - 0:02:18
If thatâ€™s the case with you, you want to
make sure you follow the following food preservation

0:02:18 - 0:02:19
techniques.

0:02:19 - 0:02:20
1.

0:02:20 - 0:02:21
Canning.

0:02:21 - 0:02:26
There are foods that can stay fresh for months
when stored in air-tight cans.

0:02:26 - 0:02:29
These could be meat, jams, fermented vegetables,
etc.

0:02:29 - 0:02:34
Therefore, you don't necessarily need to store
every food in a refrigerator.

0:02:34 - 0:02:38
If you canâ€™t do this process yourself, you
can choose to purchase canned food items at

0:02:38 - 0:02:42
the grocery shop when buying food items from
your food pantry.

0:02:42 - 0:02:43
2.

0:02:43 - 0:02:44
Dehydration.

0:02:44 - 0:02:50
Taking out the liquid in certain foods including
meat, fruits, beef, pork, etc. and letting

0:02:50 - 0:02:53
them dry up is also a good way to preserving
them.

0:02:53 - 0:02:57
Ancient technique involves sun-drying these
food items.

0:02:57 - 0:03:02
However, with the help of modern technologies,
a dehydrator can serve the same purpose.

0:03:02.480,0:03:03.480
3.

0:03:03.480,0:03:04.480
Curing.

0:03:04.480,0:03:09.430
Your meat, fish, and vegetable can be preserved
using this technique.

0:03:09.430,0:03:13.590
In this process salt is used to draw moisture
from the food item.

0:03:13.590,0:03:16.120
This helps to preserve it for a very long
time.

0:03:16.120,0:03:17.120
4.

0:03:17.120,0:03:18.120
Fermentation.

0:03:18.120,0:03:22.859
Fermentation is used in the production of
certain foods.

0:03:22.859,0:03:25.569
Some of these are sauerkraut and pickles.

0:03:25.569,0:03:28.920
You can also choose to ferment the food items
you deem fit.

0:03:28.920,0:03:33.409
Now, that's how to stock a pantry on just
about any budget and still ensure you've got

0:03:33.409,0:03:34.629
the right foods in place.

title: Top 10 Must-Have Foods for Doomsday Preppers
description:

title: DOOMSDAY PREPPERS COMPLETE SURVIVAL MANUAL #shtf #survival #survivalkit
ðŸš€ Billionaire Doomsday Preppers ðŸš€
description:
For product recommendations included in this video, visit BuckhornCliffs.com

Ever wondered why so many billionaires are turning into doomsday preppers? What's driving their fear, and more intriguingly, what do they know that we don't? 

Here's a quick dive:

Stockpiling Supplies & Building Bunkers: These aren't your ordinary hideouts; we're talking multimillion-dollar, nuclear-proof underground fortresses. Mark Zuckerberg's Hawaiian bunker project is just the tip of the iceberg.

Sam Altman's AI & Apocalypse Concerns: The OpenAI founder is prepping for AI-related catastrophes, nuclear wars, and synthetic viruses. Irony aside, it's a serious nod to the potential threats of tomorrow.

Essentials in Their Survival Kit:

Antibiotics & Water: The billionaire's bet is on medical kits with long shelf-life meds and advanced water purification tools.

Self-Defense & Survival Gear: Firearms, potassium iodide (for nuclear fallout protection), batteries, and fuel are also on their must-have list.

The Ultimate Hideout: A secret bunker in Kansas, rumored to be 15 stories underground and capable of withstanding a direct nuclear strike, showcases the extremes some are willing to go. With a starting price tag around $500,000, these bunkers are nearly sold out.

ðŸ¤” What's the Takeaway?

Is it a hint of looming global crises, or are billionaires simply crafting their ultimate insurance policies? Either way, their actions offer a fascinating peek into the mindset of those with the means to prepare for the worst.

ðŸ’¡ For the Rest of Us: While not everyone can afford a bunker, focusing on practical preparednessâ€”like securing long-life meds and water purification systemsâ€”might just be the next best step.

title: DOOMSDAY PREPPERS UNDERGROUND BUNKERS
description:
Doomsday preppers are investing a lot on underground bunkers in preparation for catastrophic disasters such as pandemics, nuclear disasters, civil unrest, and other end-of-the-world events such as the apocalypse. 

The Wall Street Jornal hints that doomsday preppers are in their underground bunker hideouts to ride out the coronavirus pandemic.

So, if you are looking into owning an underground bunker, you should budget between $35,000 to $60,000 for it depending on amenities you request for your bunker for the very basic ones.

Underground bunkers can be as comfortable as you can ever imagine and even beyond. You can find everything you'll find in the outside world in it. This could be a cinema hall, a library, gym center, a garage for your luxury cars, a swimming pool arena, and lots more.

Wondering how long you can live in an underground bunker? Well, as long as you have food and water. The very basic shelters can hold food and water for up to 30 days. However, larger shelters with underground floor storage can store food and water up to 6 months at a time.

Underground bunkers are buried 4 to 6 feet into the ground. This way, it's able to withstand very heavy blasts. However, the underground bunker claimed to be the deepest is in Beijing, China. It's known as the Central Military Commission. It's said to be up to 2,000 meters (over 6,000 foot) below ground level.

Considering these, a lot of people have asked if humans should start living underground. Whether this option will be considered or not isn't clear up to this moment. However, experts believe that with a considerable amount of planning, humans could live underground. These considerations range from how to bury powerlines and information system connections underground, planning for water transmission, sewage pipes, malls, basements, pedestrian tunnels, motorways, and so on.

To wrap it all up, if you are considering owning an underground bunker, it's required that you get a planning permit from the authorized body where you reside.

title: Are You Prepared  The Rise of Doomsday Preppers  #viral #shortvideo #world #youtubeshorts
Doomsday Preppers Food Preservation Techniques
description:
Doomsday Preppers Food Preservation Techniques

Doomsday preppers as we know are always on the lookout for the best foods to store for a long time and most importantly, how best to store them.

The following preservation techniques allow doomsday preppers to store food against the next major disaster.

Here are six techniques by top doomsday preppers themselves to ensure a long shelf life for your food items.

Technique 1; Drying.

Keeping your good stuffs, most especially, grains dry is one of the best ways to keeping them fresh for a couple of weeks, months, or even years.

However, you must have the right storage space for this. You want to keep your food items far from where they'll be susceptible to attacks by insects, rodents, etc.

Technique 2; Smoking.

Smoking food items is another method for preserving food items for long term storage. Though majorly used for preserving meat and fish, some also find it useful for preserving some kind of vegetables. The drier these food items get, the longer they are able to stay in storage.

Technique 3; Pickling.

Pickling is a process of preserving or extending the shelf life of food by either anaerobic fermentation in brine (salt and sugar solution), or immersion in vinegar.

It can be used to preserve fruits, vegetables, and meat.

Technique 4; Salting.

Salting is an aged technique that still works like magic. Salt sucks the moisture out of meat, preventing the growth of bacteria and other microbes. However, after salting, you need to keep the meat in an airtight container.

Technique 5; Coating With Oil or Honey.

This is another ancient technique. Coating meat, fruits, and veggies with oil or honey ensures bacteria don't grow on them.

Technique 6; Settle For M.R.E. (meals ready to eat).

Pre-made meals are to a certain extent, the top choice for even preppers as well. If you are new to all previously mentioned techniques, you might want to stock-up pre-made meals.

However, they can stay as long as the manufacturer recommends. If you need them to stay longer, you might want to consider other techniques earlier mentioned.

To wrap it all up. All the techniques mentioned herein aren't only useful to doomsday preppers, survivalists, or even off-gridders alone. Anyone can do them.

Something to note, however, is that when storing food items for long, it's advisable you use up old stock and then replace it with new ones.

Resources:

* Prepperswill: https://prepperswill.com/long-term-food-storage-techinques/

title: Doomsday Preppers; Pandemic Prepping tips to survive any pandemic at all (coronavirus, etc)
description:
Doomsday Preppers; Pandemic Prepping tips to survive any pandemic at all (coronavirus, etc)

Doomsday preppers don't seem to be disturbed about the novel coronavirus pandemic.

They are a group of people who hope for the best but expect the worst.

In their opinion, the name of the pandemic doesn't matter, and as the boy scout motto goes, always be prepared, doomsday preppers are prepared for any disaster.

To show their level of confidence, they share five tips to beating the coronavirus or any other pandemic in the future.

Tip 1; Eat the right meals.

Doomsday preppers believe eating the right food will boost your immune system. They advise that you consume less junk foods but more of foods or fruits containing essential nutrients such as zinc, vitamins, copper, and so on.

Tip 2; Get adequate sleep.

In their opinion, sleep is important and you should never deprive yourself of it. This, alongside eating right will boost your body's immune system. This increases your body's ability to fight against infections.

Tip 3; Regularly restock your food supplies.

You don't have to wait till the government is about to close down markets and shopping malls. Doomsday preppers prefer to stock and restock food supplies occasionally and advise you do also. This way, you don't have to panic buy or run out of food supplies when disasters happen.

Tip 4; Excercise regularly.

This they say has mental, psychological, and other benefits to the body. This could simply be walking a considerable distance on regular bases, jogging, shadow boxing, among others. This increases white blood cells and builds your body against infections.

Tip 5; Get the right information.

Feeding your mind with too much or incorrect information is deadly. Don't entertain fear. For this reason, doomsday preppers only advise you get information from credible sources only.

Get adequate information on What is Coronavirus, Coronavirus Symptoms, and Coronavirus Transmission here:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mTvlgsjaizk&t=59s

If you loved this video, here are a few more suggestions:

Doomsday preppers food ideas: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aTsANaCHCf8

Doomsday preppers is a show that was on National Geographic that follows the lives of 'ordinary' Americans that are preparing for the end of the world.

I really hope you enjoy my new commentary and reactions to doomsday preppers, this show is so goofy

In todays episode we will actually be looking at a Canadian prepper who just happens to live 45 minutes from my house! If this episode gets some love I will make a point of going there in real life!

This is the first time we will be watching a Canadian on doomsday preppers and you all will see a huge difference in mentality, however I think this is the first episode of doomsday preppers that we have seen where I am almost certain that this guy is starting a cult.

title: Best Doomsday Preppers Food Ideas
description:
Doomsday preppers are always on the lookout for food items which can last a very long time in storage. These could be grains, vegetables, meat, and so on.

Whether you are new into prepping, or just looking for food ideas that can last a long time on your food shelf, here are a couple of best preppers food ideas for you.

1. Some dairy products.

Under this category, you'll want to store some milk. The powdered forms are better, they last longer. Some cheese would be awesome too. Thankfully, you can also get cheese in powdered form.

2. Some fruits for vitamins.

Trying to preserve fresh fruits can be painstaking. However, an alternative to this is stocking up dried or canned fruits. There are a variety of them to choose from.

3. Some veggies to accompany every meal.

Like fruits, they nourish your body with loads of vitamins and minerals. You can get canned veggies at your local grocery store also.

4. Beef and chicken.

This may not be important to someone who only focuses is to survive. However, it's totally worth it to have in your pantry. If you won't be using any of the doomsday preppers food preservation techniques to preserve your meat, you can settle for freeze-dried ground beef or freeze-dried ground chicken.

5. Grains.

In this category, there are a whole lot of options to choose from. You'll want to look into stockpiling beans, rice, lentils, oatmeal, pasta, corn, wheat, and so on.

6. Some sweetening.

These we probably can't do without. We need them to spark up our gloomy day. So, look into keeping some sugar, honey, jams and jellies, and molasses.

7. Some spices.

Salt and pepper. You'll definitely need them.

Previously mentioned are just a few of best doomsday preppers food ideas by top doomsday preppers themselves. However, if you still need a few more, then you should consider the following.

Pickle relish, ketchup, mustard, soy sauce, maple syrup, baking soda, yeast, apple cider vinegar, vanilla extract, canned soups, among others.

Reference:

Preppers Unlimited: https://preppersunlimited.com/the-best-foods-for-preppers/

Thanks for visiting. Make sure you like, subscribe, and click the notification bell. That way, you get notified if we upload any new content.

Need to reach us via email for feedback, comments, partnerships, etc, shoot your messages to simplyput2020@gmail.com.

title: Doomsday Preppers Food Storage Tips
description:
Doomsday Preppers Food Storage Tips

Hoarding food for doomsday preppers with a long shelf life is crucial because you never know when a disaster might occur and how long it will take for the community to recover.

One of the first things people think of when they hear the word "prepping" is the massive storage of food. Television shows like "Survivor" and "American Horror Story" have brought this way of life to the fore.

What you need when you store food items, how will you be able to afford them, and what is the best way to store them are always the big question we are left to figure out.

When storing food in an emergency, it is important to think about how much food you need and how you will protect your food.

Anything you can do will always make the list, especially canned food. But what kind of food can you keep in a storage container with the right amount of storage space?

Dried beans, white rice and pasta are easy to prepare and can last up to 10 years, so you can save money and still have a long lifespan. You can be sure that, faced with an SHTF scenario, you will have enough to eat, as long as you plan.

We have already compiled some of the best food storage tips for the most common food emergencies such as hurricanes, tornadoes, floods, or earthquakes.

The following are tips you might want to follow to extend the shelf life of your food. Following these simple common-sense practices can mean that your food lasts longer than would normally be the case in an emergency.

A great way to ensure that food is sealed and does not develop mold over time is to use a mylar storage bag with an oxygen absorber.

Mylar bags are great because they are crucial for long-term food storage, limiting the factors that affect foods, such as temperature and humidity, while also limiting the risk of annoying rodents.

You will undoubtedly find that most doomsday preppers use mylar bags just to enhance the protection of their foods. However, these bags can also be used for a variety of other purposes, such as an oxygen absorber.

The following will guide you on the best foods and emergency supplies you can buy at the grocery store.

Comfort food can be something you need to keep in mind when you start storing food, especially in stressful survival situations. A pantry should also have food supplies for emergencies that can be seized in a hopeless situation, or if you are overrun by people desperate for supplies, or if you have to leave due to a disaster or other threat.

While some more intensive taxidermists claim to keep supplies of a year or more, the CDC recommends keeping food worth about two weeks for the family. 

No matter what amount of food you choose to store, remember that each person in a family needs 2,500 calories a day, depending on the level of stress and extra effort.

For longer storage, a medium-sized storage tank could be filled with food. Many people who plan to store food for the long term in the event of a disaster or other events simply fill their basements with dried food.

This is also one of the primary challenges that everyone faces when starting off prepping.

You definitely won't want to live on beans and rice for six months at a time. If you are considering or planning a long-term food storage system, start with foods that are simple, cheap, and that can last long. You can always find relevant information on the food wrappers or ask the store attendant for help.

References:

https://blog.gunassociation.org/canning-tips-make-food-last-long-time/

https://survivalist101.com/tutorials/preppers-guide-prepping-for-beginners/preppers-guide-stockpiling-food/

https://offgridsurvival.com/survivalfood/

https://blog.usstoragesearch.com/doomsday-prepper-series-food-storage/

https://www.thefrugalfarmer.net/10-tips-smart-long-term-food-storage/

https://thepreppingguide.com/foods-with-longest-shelf-life/

Need to reach us via email for feedback, comments, partnerships, etc, shoot your messages to simplyput2020@gmail.com.

title: Texas doomsday preppers poised for power outage as winter storm sparks end of world fears
description: Texas: Large snownado seen over Cedar Creek Lake Sign up for  for the biggest new releases, reviews and tech hacks  SUBSCRIBE  Â When you subscribe we will use the information you provide to send you these newsletters. Sometimes they'll include recommendations for other related newsletters or services we offer. Our Privacy Notice explains more about how we use your data, and your rights. You can unsubscribe at any time.Â US President Joe Biden approved a state of emergency after a huge storm currently sweeping acrossÂ southern AmericaÂ killed nearly 50 people and left millions without power. Yesterday, nearly 12 million residents in Texas were told to boil tap water before consuming it after power blackouts at treatment facilities. The state's energy grid has been overwhelmed by a surge in demand as people try to keep warm following some areas plunging into temperatures as low as -18C.Â One online user claimed "it may be the end of the world," another added "snow in Texas has got to mean the end of the world is near," and a third believed "itâ€™s literally the end of the world".Â But others turned their attention to doomsday preppers, who have been preparing for this exact moment for years.Â One tweet reads: â€œDoomsday preppers in Texas are probablyÂ saying,Â â€˜I told you soâ€™ right now.â€Â Another added: â€œTexas doomsday preppers are so smug right now.â€Â And another stated: â€œI am slowly inching toward becoming one of those doomsday preppers.â€Â This community is obsessed with the end of civilisationÂ and was at the centre of a National Geographic TV show that ran from 20 to 2014.Â The first episode of the programme introduced viewers to Paul Range and Gloria Haswell â€“ who had enough food stored to feed 22 people for 15 years â€” as well as scores of guns, bullets and vehicles to fight a small war.Â The couple occupied nine steel shipping containers arranged in a castle formation outside Floresville, Texas.Â Â They refused to rely on the grid â€“ instead, they used a system of windmills and solar panelsÂ toÂ powerÂ theÂ compound,Â and used human body waste to generate methane for cooking.Â  Trending Â Fear of nuclear obliteration during the Cold War fuelled the interest in doomsday prepping decades ago, but now the main factor driving its continuing spread is the rapid exchange of ideas on the internet.Â Lorenzo DiTommasso, chairman and associate professor of religion at Concordia University in Montreal, previously told LiveScience: â€We're in a peak, and have been for the last 40 years.Â â€œThere's no single more important explanation as to the presence of apocalyptic thought in the world today than the development of theÂ internet.Â â€œYou can learn everything you want about the flipping of the magnetic poles on theÂ internet.Â Â â€œAnd you can find out related information that would lead you to also believe the poles are going to flip because of, for instance, the presence of a previously unknown planet in the solar system."Â Â Mr Range and Ms Haswell believedÂ that a magnetic pole reversal woul

title: Doomsday Preppers - Doomsday Preppers
description:
http://economiccollapse.info  

Why the Dollar and the Euro are mathematically guaranteed to collapse and have been since the moment they were created. You don't need to be an economist to understand what I'm going to show you. A little common sense will do just fine. The dollar and the Euro are debt based currencies created by the Federal Reserve and the European Central Bank. 

Now these central banks, while masquerading as public entities are actually made up of a consortium of the most powerful private banks in the world.  When I say that the Dollar and the Euro are debt based currencies what this means is that dollars and euros are loaned into existence. Central banks create money out of thin air by loaning money that does not yet exist to their respective governments, since the vast majority of money in circulation is now digital Such an operation doesn't even require the printing of physical paper, money and the debt that accompanies it is simply typed into existence.

Now these privately owned central banks don't just loan up their imaginary money for free, they charge interest. And the money to pay back that interest doesn't yet exist in the system. Since all money is created this way, there's always more total debt plus interest to be paid back than there is money. This forces governments to constantly return to those banks for more loans which create more money and interest. This is obviously a ponzi scheme, and like all ponzi schemes it can only work for so long.
 
The inevitable result when there's more total debt to be paid due to interest than money in existence is that eventually the debt will reach such astronomical proportions that it will become impossible to service that debt. This is why I said the collapse of the Dollar and the Euro is a mathematical certainty. It's been guaranteed since the beginning on the very nature of our monetary system. You might ask yourself why anybody in their right mind would set up a system like this thatâ€™s guaranteed to fail.  And the answer is simple, the same reason that any criminal sets up a ponzi scheme. 

There's a small group of bankers that get very, very rich at the expense of the public before the system begins to falter and they use that money to buy real assets that maintain their value after the currency falls. Sounds criminal to you? Well that's cause it is. And you know what, they're going to get away with it if we don't make a concentrated effort right now to educate the public about the true nature of money and the private central banks which are leading us to the slaughter.  And if we let them get away with this this time the next ponzi scheme is going to be even bigger.
